text: Recently, bacterial strains producing SCFAs have gained extreme popularity. @Chemical$ are small organic monocarboxylic acids, released after the fermentation of indigestible alimentary fiber (mainly galacto- or fructooligosaccharides), plant-derived polysaccharides, or the metabolism of @Chemical$, and are considered a key gut-derived metabolites with beneficial health effects and as essential in gut-brain crosstalk.
